privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how the Event.io Chat Widget ("we", "our", or "the Widget") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our chat service to discover events.
privacy.section1Content: When you use the Chat Widget, we may collect the following information:
privacy.collected1: Chat Messages: Your questions and conversations with the AI assistant
privacy.collected2: Location Data: If you choose to share your location, we collect geolocation data (latitude/longitude) to provide location-based event recommendations. This is stored in your browser's localStorage for convenience.
privacy.collected3: Email Address: If you subscribe to event notifications, we collect and store your email address
privacy.collected4: Usage Data: Chat history, saved lists, favorited events stored locally in your browser
privacy.collected5: Session Information: Agent ID, Client ID, and session identifiers for service functionality
privacy.collected6: Browser Storage: We use localStorage and sessionStorage to save your preferences, chat history, and settings locally on your device
privacy.section2Content: We use the collected information to:
privacy.use1: Provide AI-powered event recommendations and search functionality
privacy.use2: Send you email notifications about events you're interested in (only if you subscribe)
privacy.use3: Remember your chat history and saved lists across sessions
privacy.use4: Improve our service and user experience
privacy.use5: Provide location-specific event recommendations when you share your location
privacy.section3Bullet1: Local Storage: Chat history, lists, and preferences are stored in your browser's localStorage and remain on your device
privacy.section3Bullet2: Server Storage: Email addresses for notifications are stored securely on our servers
privacy.section3Bullet3: Location Data: Geographic coordinates are cached locally for 5 minutes and stored in localStorage if you grant permission
privacy.section3Bullet4: Authentication: We use Keycloak for secure user authentication and OAuth2 for API access
privacy.section4Content: We integrate with the following third-party services:
privacy.thirdParty1: WhatsApp Business API: If you choose to connect via WhatsApp
privacy.thirdParty2: Email Service: For sending event notifications and sharing events via email
privacy.thirdParty3: Open Events API: For retrieving event data
privacy.thirdParty4: Keycloak: For authentication and user management
privacy.right1: Clear your chat history and stored data at any time using the clearStorage function
privacy.right2: Decline location sharing - the service will still work without it
privacy.right3: Unsubscribe from email notifications at any time
privacy.right4: Access, modify, or delete your personal information by contacting us
privacy.section6Para1: Browser data (chats, lists) is retained until you clear it manually or clear your browser storage
privacy.section6Para2: Email subscriptions are retained until you unsubscribe
privacy.section6Para3: Session data is temporary and cleared when you close the widget
privacy.section7Content: Our service is not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.section8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted in this document with an updated "Last Updated" date.
privacy.contactContent: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@event.io

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how the Event.io Chat Widget uses cookies and similar storage technologies.
cookies.section1Title: What Are Cookies and Web Storage?
cookies.section1Content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. Web Storage (localStorage and sessionStorage) provides larger storage capacity for web applications. We use these technologies to enhance your experience.
cookies.section2Content: The Chat Widget uses the following browser storage:
cookies.storage1Item1: openevents-app-state: Stores your chat history, saved lists, and favorited events
cookies.storage1Item2: userLocation: Your geographic coordinates (if you share location)
cookies.storage1Item3: locationTimestamp: When your location was last updated
cookies.storage1Item4: eventNotificationEmail: Your email for notifications (if subscribed)
cookies.storage2Item1: eventNotificationSubscribed: Whether you've subscribed in this session
cookies.storage2Item2: eventNotificationEmail: Temporary email storage during session
cookies.purpose1: Essential Functionality: Maintaining chat sessions, storing your conversations
cookies.purpose2: User Preferences: Remembering your language choice, location settings
cookies.purpose3: Performance: Caching data to reduce server requests and improve speed
cookies.purpose4: Convenience: Keeping you logged in and remembering your saved lists
cookies.section4Content: When you interact with integrated services, they may set their own cookies:
cookies.thirdParty1: Keycloak Authentication: Session cookies for secure login
cookies.thirdParty2: WhatsApp Integration: May set cookies if you use WhatsApp connect feature
cookies.section5Para1: You can clear all Chat Widget data using the clearStorage() function available in the application.
cookies.section5Para2: You can also clear cookies and storage through your browser settings:
cookies.browser1: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Clear browsing data
cookies.browser2: Firefox: Settings → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data → Clear Data
cookies.browser3: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage Website Data → Remove All
cookies.section5Para3: Note: Clearing storage will remove your chat history, saved lists, and preferences.
cookies.section6Item2: sessionStorage: Cleared when you close the browser tab
cookies.section6Item4: Location data: 5 minutes (but persisted in localStorage if granted)
cookies.contactContent: If you have questions about our use of cookies and storage, contact us at: privacy@event.io
